properties.description: Please input a folder path as the parameter for this pipeline, and the pipeline will delete files which were last modified more than 30 days ago under the particular folder path.

activities.name: DeleteFiles
activities.description: Connect to your storage account to save the log file.

dataflowSinks.name: UserQueryCSVBlobDataSet
dataflowSinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['powerqry.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> UserQueryCSVBlobDataSet

scriptLines: people as (Address as (country as string, state as string, zipcode as integer), Contact as (Phone as integer, email as string), Name as string, Skills as string[], id as short)[]

sources.name: Employee2
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Employee2

sources.name: Department2
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Department2
